bibl.bibl: Journal of researches (1870): Journal of researches into the natural history and geology of the countries visited during the voyage of HMS Beagle round the world, under the command of Capt. FitzRoy RN. By Charles Darwin. New edition. London: John Murray. 1870.
bibl.idno: Freeman 1977, p. 40. Text not different from 1860, but called "new edition". Not in Worldcat; several of the other editions arenâ€™t either.
